title: EXPLOITATION - Control M Jobs DEACTIVATION - Deactivate realtime inbound and outbound connectivity with ATLAS

task_list.instruction_title:
Deactivate realtime inbound and outbound connectivity with Atlas on Prod Like Environment:
 - Incoming: ConvFromHost (On-Line), Treasury Link (On-Line), Treasury Link Deposit
 - Outgoing: HostLink FX (On-Line), HostLink MM (On Line), LinkVision Export, Cours Spot Minute

Disable these jobs:

For me you have to run this job insted of the previous one : E3_T001APP_KDR_KILL-LOOP-START-CONVLINK

For me you have to run this job insted of the previous one : 

E3_T001KDR_NDO871

E3_T001KDR_NDO881
